message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product that's worth $1200000 to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. This is a great deal, and I think you won't find a better offer anywhere else.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand that you think $950000 is a fair price, but I was hoping we could meet in the middle. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $975000. This is a compromise that I think you'll find reasonable.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $960000. I believe this is a better price for both of us, considering the product's value to me.
I see you're getting closer to my initial offer. I'm willing to meet you at $965000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, but I'm confident you'll find it a fair price for this incredible product.

I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still trying to get as close to my target price as possible. I'm willing to meet you at $955000. I think this is a fair price for both of us, considering the product's value to me.
